name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: This course offers an introduction to the field of computer science, introducing students to the fundamentals of programming and computer systems.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: This course covers basic techniques and approaches for designing and analyzing algorithms and data structures.

name: Operating Systems
description: This course covers the fundamentals of operating systems, including topics such as process scheduling, memory management, and filesystems.

name: Computer Networks
description: This course covers the fundamentals of computer networking, including topics such as network protocols, routing, and security.

name: Computer Security
description: This course covers the fundamentals of computer security, including topics such as authentication, encryption, and network security.
